Description: The kings of the overworld. How shall you fare in the darkness?
That shape in the darkness?  He was your friend, care to test your friendship now?
The sense of self-preservation is not a prevalent Goblin trait, neither is diplomacy.
Head and tail of a bull, body of a man, rage of a volcano. Your eulogy will be delivered to a closed casket.
A carnivorous mold that's not exceptionally mobile or intelligent or threatening or even aware of your presence.
Dwellers of the deep, kin to the rock. Beware their righteous community dedicated to their deity.
